attributes.action: make public transport affordable for daily use and improve routes, service capacity and train speeds and encouraging discounted tickets on train lines facing repair disruption. in an attempt to reduce congestion and pollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently public transport is not competitive with road travel.  In many places it is still cheaper to drive and pay for parking, then to pay for a train or bus ticket.  Not to mention the convenience.  If the government wants to really tackle our congested roads they must look into making it affordable and possible to make the equivalent journey by bus and train.  Now it simply can't be done, and if atempted is done under someones hideous sweaty armpit as its too crowded or takes two to three times as long.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
